channel.title: Personals on Michael Campfield | Mythre
channel.description: Recent content in Personals on Michael Campfield | Mythre

item.description: Some Personal Interests: Slide rules and mechanical calculators Tabletop games Historic libraries Game design Beekeeping Storytelling and writing Camping / hiking Adventure / point-and-click computer games

Some of the beautiful libraries I’ve visited: IE, Dublin: Long Room, Trinity College, Dublin MA, Boston: Boston College, Bapst Library MA, Boston: Boston Public Library, Central branch MD, Baltimore: George Peabody Library MO, St. Louis: St. Louis Central Library TN, Nashville: Nashville Main Library

Places of Local Color: GA, Atlanta: Eats, Fox Brothers BBQ GA, Tybee Island: The Crab Shack GR, Cape Sounion: Temple of Poseidon MD, St. Mary’s City: Solomon Island Tiki Bar NY, Vestal: Lupo’s Spiedie and Rib Pit,Vestal Bakery and Deli (Perfect white sheet pizza with tomatoes & onions). TN, Knoxville: Archers BBQ, M&M BBQ, The Casual Pint: Northshore TN, Oak Ridge: Razzleberries, The Other One VA, Roanoke: Wanju Korean Restaurant
